mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS id, p.amount AS amount, p.payment_date AS payment_date, t.ticket_no AS ticket_no, t.ticket_status AS ticket_status, tm.terminal_name AS start_terminal, tm2.terminal_name AS end_terminal, di.departure_time AS departure_time, b.bus_type AS bus_type FROM pay p INNER JOIN ticket t ON p.pay_no = t.pay_no INNER JOIN dispatch_info di ON di.dispatch_no = t.dispatch_no INNER JOIN bus b ON b.bus_no = di.bus_no INNER JOIN terminal tm ON di.start_point = tm.terminal_no INNER JOIN terminal tm2 ON di.end_point = tm2.terminal_no WHERE p.id = #{id}
